Evolved Mod

AoW 4 Evolved is a balance mod aimed at simultaneous turn multiplayer.
However, the mod can also be applied to single player games to shake things up and experience a more rounded game.

This mod makes a lot of tweaks to all aspects of the game, from Units to City Structures to the Empire Tree.
It also includes some major mechanic overhauls such as reworking how (Signature) Hero Skills and Friendly Domain features work.

The goal of the mod is to expand the game with more viable gameplay options and strategies (looking at you Order and Nature affinities).
This is mainly achieved by buffing underperforming options, but there are also times where something is so blatantly overpowered that it must be nerfed or risk always being a must-pick.

However, balance can only take us so far. Therefore a few key mechanics have been overhauled and are now more reminiscent of previous AoW games.
Of course this doesn't come without its own risks and the mod will be continually evaluated and iterated upon over time.

Aside from general balance, the most impactful changes are as follows:

  • All map sizes have been increased by 10-20%.
  • A new Extra Large map size has been added for 1v1.
  • Land now spawns less mountains and has small lakes.
  • Pangea has been edited to spawn 30% less water.
  • Form Traits now work based on a 10 point system, for better balance.
  • Most of the mounted traits have gained additional abilities or stats.
  • Society Traits no longer grant bonus ranks to specific units.
  • Increasing the City Cap scales with +200 instead of +300 per use.
  • Free Cities are always of a different race (like Reaver has).
  • Combat morale has been reworked to be less punishing overall.
  • All T1 tomes now always unlock their summon as the initial spell.
  • All unit types are now less weak to certain damage channels.
  • Chaplain, Afflictor and Transmuter can now be mounted.
  • Skald once again has Hastened on Song of Revelry.
  • Skald once again has range on both Song abilities.
  • Transmuter now deals damage with Petrify, like a true Battle Mage.
  • Reaver Culture War Spoils have been entirely reworked.
  • Dark Culture has a new economical passive (Stability Agenda).
  • High Culture's Alignment Agenda has been fully reworked.
  • All 2-Handed Hero weapons now grant Heavy Charge Strike.
  • Friendly Domain movement discount has been removed.
  • Advanced Logistics grants Fast instead of Very Fast Movement in water.
  • HP Regeneration has been lowered from 25 to 15 in Friendly Domain.
  • Banner XP Pickups have been removed from the map entirely.
  • Outposts can no longer build Stone Walls and be unsiegable.
  • XP gained from combat is now always divided by 6, instead of 4.
  • Town Hall boost has been lowered from 5/10/15 to 4/8/12.
  • Wizard's Tower boosts have been removed entirely.
  • All resource structures are locked behind Town Hall tiers.
  • All buffs and all debuffs now stack up to 3 times, down from 5.
  • All Guilds now provide unique effects to their cities.
